data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lorentzen, Dörte, Koenemann, Stefan, Iliffe, Thomas M. (2007): Speleonectes emersoni, a new species of Remipedia (Crustacea) from the Dominican Republic. Zootaxa 1543: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177940
